hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`FEEDBACK_ID` feedbackId, `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID` gameId, `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_TYPE` gameType, `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`TITLE` title, CASE WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='NEW_ARRIVAL' THEN '未处理' WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='IN_PROGRESS' THEN '处理中' WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='DONE' THEN '处理毕' END status, `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` statusIndex, HOUR(TIMEDIFF(NOW(), `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME`)) hours, DATE_FORMAT(`GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME`, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") createTime, `PLAYER_PROFILE`.`NAME` name, CAST(`GAME_FEEDBACK`.`DESCRIPTION` AS CHAR) description FROM `GAME_FEEDBACK`, `GAME_RECORD`, `PLAYER_PROFILE` WHERE `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID` = `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_ID` AND `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_BY` = `PLAYER_PROFILE`.`PROFILE_ID` AND (? = '' or `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` = ?) AND `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME` BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UPPER(`GAME_FEEDBACK`.`TITLE`) LIKE UPPER(?) ORDER BY `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME` DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) RECORD_COUNT FROM GAME_FEEDBACK GF, GAME_RECORD GR, PLAYER_PROFILE PP WHERE GF.GAME_ID = GR.GAME_ID AND GF.CREATE_BY = PP.PROFILE_ID AND (? = '' or GF.STATUS = ?) AND GF.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN ? AND DATE_ADD(?, INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND UPPER(GF.TITLE) LIKE UPPER(?)

SELECT `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID`, `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_TYPE`, `TITLE`, CASE WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='NEW_ARRIVAL' THEN '未处理' WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='IN_PROGRESS' THEN '处理中' WHEN `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` ='DONE' THEN '处理毕' END STATUS, DATE_FORMAT(`GAME_FEEDBACK`.`CREATE_TIME`, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") AS `CREATE_TIME` FROM `GAME_FEEDBACK` LEFT JOIN `GAME_RECORD` ON `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`GAME_ID` = `GAME_RECORD`.`GAME_ID` WHERE `GAME_FEEDBACK`.`STATUS` <> ? ORDER BY `CREATE_TIME` DESC
